Rock_Hill.Red River, South Carolina: Red River is an unincorporated community in York County, South Carolina, United States surrounded by the city of Rock Hill along the Catawba River in the piedmont of South Carolina. It has not yet been annexed into the city of Rock Hill, but in the recent years the area surrounding the community have been annexed, because South Carolina has strict laws on cities annexing the surrounding areas of cities. Red River is located at latitude 34.961 and longitude -80.965 with an elevation of the community is 548 feet.
